section1.title: Solutions
section1.description: Gronic is a leader in integrated pest management strategies and solutions. Based on biological control methods that are found in nature, our products are safe, environmentally friendly, and easy to use—helping to eliminate the current global dependency on conventional pesticides.

section2.title: Why Choose our products Over Conventional Pesticides?

tableItems.title: Safety
tableItems.conventional: Poisonous & possibly toxic, human health concerns
tableItems.cDesc: Pesticides must be toxic, or poisonous, to be effective against pests. They can be harmful to humans, animals and the environment. A growing body of research links pesticides to human disease, making its use in agriculture and urban environments alarming.
tableItems.gronic: Completely nontoxic; safe for humans, pets & environment
tableItems.gDesc: Gronic solutions utilize naturally-occurring pheromones, which are nontoxic and completely safe for humans, pets and the environment. The Environmental Protection Agency considers mating disruption to be one of the safest solutions available to control pest populations.

tableItems.title: Residue
tableItems.conventional: Spray 100% of corp - high residue risk
tableItems.cDesc: In order for traditional pesticides to be effective, every square inch of the crop must be covered—including the food we eat (e.g., fruits, vegetables and grains). This not only creates safety concerns but is highly inefficient due to drift through the air and runoff into the soil and water supply.
tableItems.gronic: Contacts < 1% of crop - zero residue risk
tableItems.gDesc: Gronic Solutions products eliminate residue concerns because they are safe and do not require complete coverage of the crop to be effective. On average, ISCA’s Mating Disruption solutions contact less than 1% of the crop surface area, making it a far more efficient alternative.

tableItems.title: Approach
tableItems.cDesc: Conventional pesticide use is a reactive approach—growers must react to pests that have already infiltrated their crops. As a result, they end up chasing after insects with pesticides, hoping to eradicate adults and their larvae. Application must be repeated frequently, creating a dependence on pesticide use.
tableItems.gronic: Proactive - control pests before they become a problem
tableItems.gDesc: Gronic Solutions approach to pest control is proactive—our Mating Disruption products prevent pests from reproducing, thereby controlling insect populations before they become a problem. Our pheromone solution renders males incapable of finding females to mate with, so procreation is averted and populations dwindle.

tableItems.title: Collateral damage
tableItems.cDesc: Conventional pesticide use requires blanket spraying of the entire crop, which kills non-target insects (like honeybees or ladybugs) that serve as pollinators or natural predators to pests that can aid in crop growth. Without these beneficial insects, crop health suffers.
tableItems.gronic: Species - specific - only affects target pests
tableItems.gDesc: Gronic Solutions products are species-specific and target only the pests damaging your crops—without damaging ecosystems or disturbing beneficial insects like honeybees or ladybugs.

tableItems.title: Environmental footprint
tableItems.cDesc: The poisonous nature of pesticides combined with blanket spraying of crops can be toxic and contaminate our food, soil and bodies of water. Ecosystems suffer and a number of other non-target organisms like birds, fish and beneficial insects may be harmed.
tableItems.gDesc: Gronic Solutions products are species-specific and target only the pests damaging your crops—without damaging ecosystems or disturbing beneficial insects like honeybees or ladybugs.

tableItems.title: efficacy
tableItems.conventional: Short field, high risk of resistance
tableItems.cDesc: Traditional pesticides can become ineffective because insects build resistance to them after repeated exposure. This typically results in a continuous increase in pesticide use to see effectiveness, and growers must spend more and more money every year on pesticides. Moreover, pesticides generally have a short field life, so there is a constant need to spray.
tableItems.gronic: Long field life, no risk of resistance
tableItems.gDesc: ISCA’s Mating Disruption solutions have proven to be as effective or more effective at pest control than conventional pesticides. However, insect pests do not develop a resistance to the pheromones used in ISCA’s Mating Disruption solutions, eliminating the need to increase product use over time. Additionally, the products have much longer field lives, helping to reduce costs.

section3.title: Integrated Pest Management Strategies for the Planet
section3.description1: In the past, protecting crops from pests meant one thing: blanket-spraying conventional pesticides. The unscrupulous use conventional pesticides have created problems that can no longer be ignored—namely, significant risk to the environment, public health and food safety. Consumers and regulators have caught on and the demand for safer alternatives is rising at an exponential rate. As a distributor or grower, can you meet this market need?
section3.description2: Gronic offers various integrated pest management solutions designed to protect crops from harmful insects while protecting the planet with the safest technologies available.

subSections.title: Lures
subSections.description: Our products utilize safe semiochemicals to lure insect pests into traps or beneficial insects to crops. By mimicking insect attraction systems found in nature, we create sustainable technologies to manage insect behavior.

subSections.title: Attractants
subSections.description: Our products with environmentally-friendly solutions that mimic nature and eliminate the need for blanket spraying of pesticides.

subSections.title: Mass Trapping
subSections.description: Our Traps allow growers to gain a better understanding of pest activity—such as which species are affecting crops and when they are most likely to attack. Proactive analysis gives us the knowledge needed to make smarter choices regarding pest control solutions

subSections.title: TricoSafe
subSections.description: Our product is a biological alternative to protect crops against Lepidoptera pests

subSections.title: ViroSafe
subSections.description: Naturally occurring microorganism to control various specific pests.

subSections.title: FungSafe
subSections.description: Naturally occurring microorganism protecting plant tissue from pathogen attacks.

subSections.title: ProSAFE
subSections.description: Different natural predators and entomopathogenic nematodes against important pests.
